rules_text:
Exceed [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value greater than the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value greater than the greatest mana value among noncreature permanents you control and noncreature cards in your graveyard, draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]“Like water floats to the skies, so must I ascend.”[/i]
